product.title: The Dad Cap in Fudge
product.body_html: Thanks to pops around the world, your head just got an upgrade. The Dad cap is the soft, slightly-curved, low-sitting cousin to the classic structured, higher baseball cap. Cotton six-panel cap. Stitched logo label at front.
